name: find_zip_codes_by_city_and_district
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool polish_zip_codes.
Tool description: Poczta polska - zip codes
API description: Fetch the zip codes for a specified city and district in Poland.

city.description: The name of the city to search for zip codes.

district.description: The district within the specified city to search for zip codes.

x_traceid.description: A trace ID that is copied to the API response header. Default is 'optional_abc123'.
